bio: Within the stronghold of Dushnikh Yal, I am Nilvas Reinhardt, a Redguard, embracing the path of a two-handed warrior and paladin. The harsh landscapes of the Reach are my training grounds, where I face the challenges of both the natural world and the inner struggles of honor and duty. With my mighty weapon in hand, I stand as a guardian of the orcish traditions, proving my mettle in the fierce battles that echo through the mountainous region.
name: Nilvas Reinhardt
